classes.description: Applies force to agents/particles to align them with neighbors.

classes.description: Applies anticipatory avoidance force to agents/particles to avoid potential future collisions with other agents/particles.

classes.name: POP Steer Cohesion

classes.description: Applies force to agents/particles according to directions from a path curve.

classes.name: POP Steer Seek
classes.description: Applies force to agents/particles to move them toward a target position.

classes.name: POP Steer Separate
classes.description: Apply force to agents/particles to move them apart from each other.

classes.name: POP Steer Solver
classes.description: Used internally in the crowd solver to integrate steering forces.

classes.name: POP Steer Turn Constraint
classes.description: Constrains agent velocity to only go in a direction within a certain angle range of its current heading, to prevent agents from floating backward.

classes.name: POP Steer Wander
classes.description: Apply forces to agents/particles to create a random motion.

classes.name: POP Stream
classes.description: A POP node that creates a new stream of particles.

classes.name: POP Torque
classes.description: A POP node that applies torque to particles, causing them to spin.

classes.name: POP VOP

classes.name: POP Velocity
classes.description: A POP node that directly changes the velocity of particles.

classes.name: POP Wind

classes.name: POP Wrangle
classes.description: Runs a VEX snippet to modify particles.

classes.name: MotionClip Extract
classes.description: Extracts the motion of joints over a set of frames from a MotionClip.

classes.name: MotionClip Extract Key Poses
classes.description: Identifies the key poses of an animation

classes.name: MotionClip Extract Locomotion
classes.description: Extracts the locomotion from a MotionClip and manages its representation.

classes.name: MotionClip Pose Delete
classes.description: Removes the specified poses from the MotionClip.

classes.name: MotionClip Pose Insert
classes.description: Adds a new sample to a MotionClip containing the given pose

classes.name: MotionClip Retime
classes.description: Adjusts the timing of a MotionClip

classes.name: MotionClip Sequence
classes.description: Concatenates two MotionClips.

classes.name: MotionClip Update
classes.description: Update a MotionClip using the given point list.

classes.name: MotionMixer
classes.description: Combine MotionClips to generate animation.

classes.name: MotionMixerFetch
classes.description: Fetch MotionMixer internal geometry when cooking a MotionClip Effect.

classes.name: Muscle Constraint Properties Vellum
classes.description: Creates and modifies the muscle Vellum constraints for the input solid muscle geometry in preparation for the muscle solver.

classes.name: Muscle Flex
classes.description: Activates and animates the contraction and relaxation of input solid muscle geometry.

classes.name: Muscle ID
classes.description: Creates and assigns Muscle IDs to each connected cluster of primitives on the input geometry.

classes.name: Muscle Merge
classes.description: Merges muscle geometry from its inputs.

classes.name: Muscle Mirror
classes.description: Duplicates muscle geometry with symmetry. Muscle attributes are also copied/renamed with symmetry.

classes.name: Muscle Paint
classes.description: A stroke-based paint tool for modifying muscle attributes.

classes.name: Muscle Preroll
classes.description: Transitions input bone, muscle, tissue, or skin geometry from their static t-poses into the start frame of their animated sequence.

classes.name: Muscle Properties
classes.description: Creates and modifies the physical properties for the input solid muscle geometry in preparation for the muscle solver.

classes.name: Muscle Solidify
classes.description: Converts input surface geometry to a tetrahedral mesh for use as muscles.

classes.name: Muscle Solver Vellum
classes.description: Computes the dynamics simulation for the muscle pass using Vellum.

classes.name: Muscle Tension Lines
classes.description: Creates and attaches line segments to input bone surface geometry that then drive muscle flexion.

classes.name: Name
classes.description:
Creates a naming attribute on points or primitives allowing you
to refer to them easily, similar to groups.

classes.name: Normal
classes.description: Computes surface normal attribute.

classes.name: Null
classes.description: This node passes its input through to its output unchanged. It can act as a fixed place in the network for path references.

classes.name: ONNX Inference
classes.description: Applies inference from an ONNX Machine Learning model.

classes.name: Object Merge
classes.description: Merges geometry from multiple sources and allows you to define the manner in which they are grouped together and transformed.

classes.name: Ocean Evaluate
classes.description: Deforms input geometry based on ocean spectrum volumes.

classes.name: Ocean Foam
classes.description: Generates particle-based foam

classes.name: Ocean Source
classes.description: Generates particles and volumes from ocean spectrum volumes for use in simulations

classes.name: Ocean Spectrum
classes.description: Generates volumes containing information for simulating ocean waves.

classes.name: Ocean Waves
classes.description: Instances individual waveforms onto input points and generated points.

classes.name: OpenCL
classes.description: Executes an OpenCL kernel on geometry.

classes.name: Orient Joints
classes.description: Orients joints on a target skeleton.

classes.name: Orientation along Curve
classes.description: Computes orientations (frames) along curves.

classes.name: Output
classes.description: Marks the output of a sub-network.

classes.name: Pack
classes.description: Packs geometry into an embedded primitive.

classes.name: Pack Folder
classes.description: Packs inputs into a folder structure.

classes.name: Pack Inject
classes.description: Replaces the contents of Packed Primitives in-place.

classes.name: Pack Points
classes.description: Packs points into a tiled grid of packed primitives.

classes.name: Packed Disk Edit
classes.description: Editing Packed Disk Primitives.

classes.name: Packed Folder Split
classes.description: Extracts contents from a packed folder structure.

classes.name: Packed Properties
classes.description: Editing Packed Primitives.

classes.name: Paint Color Volume
classes.description: Creates a color volume based on drawn curve

classes.name: Paint Fog Volume
classes.description: Creates a fog volume based on drawn curve

classes.name: Paint SDF Volume
classes.description: Creates an SDF volume based on drawn curve

classes.name: Parent Joints
classes.description: Parent Joints on a target skeleton.

classes.name: Particle Fluid Surface
classes.description: Generates a surface around the particles from a particle fluid simulation.

classes.name: Particle Fluid Tank
classes.description: Creates a set of regular points filling a tank.

classes.name: Particle Trail
classes.description: Generates trails from the incoming particles that can be used to render sparks, fireworks, and rain.

classes.name: Path Deform
classes.description: Deforms geometry using the shape of a curve.

classes.name: Peak
classes.description: Moves primitives, points, edges or breakpoints along their normals.

classes.name: Pendulum Motion
classes.description: Inserts periods of pendulum motion into the middle of character animations.

classes.name: Planar Inflate
classes.description: Inflates a polygon into a triangle mesh.

classes.name: Planar Patch
classes.description: Creates a planar polygonal patch.

classes.name: Planar Patch from Curves
classes.description: Fills in a 2d curve network with triangles.

classes.name: Planar Pleat
classes.description: Deforms flat geometry into a pleat.

classes.name: Planar Tiles
classes.description: Generates rectangular tiles for texture patterns.

classes.name: Platonic Solids
classes.description: Creates platonic solids of different types.

classes.name: Point Capture
classes.description: Generates connectivity aware capture weights for use with Point Deform.

classes.name: Point Cloud Iso
classes.description: Constructs an iso surface from its input points.

classes.name: Point Cloud Measure
classes.description: Measures unorganized points using the characteristics of each point’s neighborhood, and puts the results in attributes.

classes.name: Point Cloud Normal
classes.description: Computes point cloud normal vectors and gives them a consistent direction.

classes.name: Point Cloud Reduce
classes.description: Reduces a point cloud using a point grid.

classes.name: Point Cloud Surface
classes.description: Constructs a surface from a point cloud.

classes.name: Point Deform
classes.description: Deforms geometry according to an arbitrary connected point mesh.

classes.name: Point Generate
classes.description: Creates new points, optionally based on point positions in the input geometry.

classes.name: Point Jitter
classes.description: Jitters points in random directions.

classes.name: Point Relax
classes.description: Moves points with overlapping radii away from each other, optionally on a surface.

classes.name: Point Replicate
classes.description: Generates a cloud of points around the input points.

classes.name: Point Split
classes.description:
Splits points shared by multiple vertices, optionally only if the vertices
differ in attribute values.

classes.name: Point Velocity
classes.description: Computes and manipulates velocities for points of a geometry.

classes.name: Point Weld
classes.description: Merges points interactively.

classes.name: Points from Volume
classes.description: Creates set of regular points filling a volume.

classes.name: Poly Bridge
classes.description: Creates flat or tube-shaped polygon surfaces between source and destination edge loops, with controls for the shape of the bridge.

classes.name: Poly Expand 2D
classes.description: Creates offset polygonal geometry for planar polygonal graphs.

classes.name: Poly Extrude
classes.description: Extrudes polygonal faces and edges.

classes.name: PolyBevel
classes.description: Creates straight, rounded, or custom fillets along edges and corners.

classes.name: PolyCut
classes.description: Breaks curves where an attribute crosses a threshold.

classes.name: PolyDoctor
classes.description: Helps repair invalid polygonal geometry, such as for cloth simulation.

classes.name: PolyFill
classes.description: Fills holes with polygonal patches.

classes.name: PolyFrame
classes.description: Creates coordinate frame attributes for points and vertices.

classes.name: PolyHinge
classes.description: Extrudes polygonal faces around a pivot line.

classes.name: PolyLoft
classes.description: Creates new polygons using existing points.

classes.name: PolyPatch
classes.description: Creates a smooth polygonal patch from primitives.

classes.name: PolyPath
classes.description: Cleans up topology of polygon curves.

classes.name: PolyReduce
classes.description: Reduces the number of polygons in a model while retaining its shape. This node preserves features, attributes, textures, and quads during reduction.

classes.name: PolySoup
classes.description: Combines polygons into a single primitive that can be more efficient for many polygons

classes.name: PolySpline
classes.description:
The PolySpline SOP fits a spline curve to a polygon or hull and
outputs a polygonal approximation of that spline.

classes.name: PolySplit
classes.description: Divides an existing polygon into multiple new polygons.

classes.name: PolyWire
classes.description:
Constructs polygonal tubes around polylines, creating
renderable geometry with smooth bends and intersections.

classes.name: Pose Difference
classes.description: Compute the difference between point transforms on two SOP skeletons.

classes.name: Pose Scope
classes.description: Assigns channel paths and/or pickscripts to geometry.

classes.name: Pose-Space Deform
classes.description: (Deprecated) Interpolates between a set of pose-shapes based on the value of a set of drivers.

classes.name: Pose-Space Deform Combine
classes.description: (Deprecated) Combine result of Pose-Space Deform with rest geometry.

classes.name: Pose-Space Edit
classes.description: (Deprecated) Packs geometry edits for pose-space deformation.

classes.name: Pose-Space Edit Configure
classes.description: (Deprecated) Creates common attributes used by the Pose-Space Edit SOP.

classes.name: Primitive Properties
classes.description: Edits primitive, primitive attributes, and profile curves.

classes.name: Principal Component Analysis
classes.description: Computes the principle components of volume or point data.

classes.name: Projectile Motion
classes.description: Inserts periods of projectile motion into the middle of character animations.

classes.name: Proximity
classes.description: Finds the nearest points to one or more target points.

classes.name: Pyro Bake Volume
classes.description: Helps develop the volume look both for viewport display and rendering after the pyro solve.

classes.name: Pyro Scatter from Burst
classes.description: Generates a cloud of points around the input points suitable for pyro trails and particle simulations.

classes.name: Pyro Solver
classes.description: Runs a dynamic Pyro simulation.

classes.name: Pyro Source
classes.description: Creates points for sourcing pyro and smoke simulations.

classes.name: Pyro Source Instance
classes.description:
Creates source instance points from spawn points for sourcing pyro
simulations with packed sets.

classes.name: Pyro Source Pack
classes.description: Creates a packed source set from the input volumes.

classes.name: Pyro Source Spread
classes.description: Pyro Source Spread solves for the spreading of flame across a point cloud.

classes.name: Pyro Spawn Sources
classes.description: Creates spawn points for sourcing pyro simulations with packed sets.

classes.name: Pyro Trail Path
classes.description: Generates curves to use as trails for the Pyro Trail Source node.

classes.name: Pyro Trail Source
classes.description: Creates points suitable for sourcing into pyro simulations to create trails for explosions.

classes.name: Python
classes.description: Runs a Python snippet to modify the incoming geometry.

classes.name: Quad Remesh
classes.description: Converts an arbitrary mesh into structured quadrilaterals.

classes.name: RBD Bullet Solver
classes.description: Runs a dynamic Bullet simulation.

classes.name: RBD Car Deform
classes.description: Add Post-Sim Deformations to RBD Cars.

classes.name: RBD Car Follow Path
classes.description: Animate a RBD Car Rig along a path.

classes.name: RBD Car Rig
classes.description: Builds a drivable RBD Car Rig.

classes.name: RBD Cluster
classes.description: Combines fractured pieces or constraints into larger clusters.

classes.description: Creates attributes describing rigid body cone twist constraints.

classes.name: RBD Configure
classes.description: Packs and creates attributes describing rigid body objects.

classes.name: RBD Connected Faces
classes.description: Stores the primitive number and distance to the opposite face on the inside faces of fractured geometry.

classes.name: RBD Constraint Properties
classes.description: Creates attributes describing rigid body constraints.

classes.name: RBD Constraints From Curves
classes.description: Creates rigid body constraint geometry from curves drawn in the viewport.

classes.name: RBD Constraints From Lines
classes.description: Creates rigid body constraint geometry from interactively drawn lines in the viewport.

classes.name: RBD Constraints From Rules
classes.description: Creates rigid body constraint geometry from a set of rules and conditions.

classes.name: RBD Convert Constraints
classes.description: Converts existing constraint prims into constraints with different anchor positions.

classes.name: RBD Deform Pieces
classes.description: Deforms geometry with simulated proxy geometry.

classes.name: RBD Deforming to Animated
classes.description: Converts deforming geometry to animated static packed objects.

classes.name: RBD Disconnected Faces
classes.description: Detects when connected faces have become separated.

classes.name: RBD Exploded View
classes.description: Visualize RBD fractured geometry merged with the proxy geometry, pushed out from the center to create an exploded view.

classes.name: RBD Find Instances
classes.description: Find instances of the same geometry pieces and replace them with packed geometry instances.

classes.name: RBD Group Constraints
classes.description: Creates constraint groups from anchored RBD pieces groups.

classes.name: RBD Guide Setup
classes.description: Sets attributes on packed fragments for the RBD Guide DOP.

classes.name: RBD I/O
classes.description: Packs RBD fractured geometry, saves them to disk, and loads them back again.

classes.name: RBD Interior Detail
classes.description: Creates additional detail on the interior surfaces of fractured geometry.

classes.description: Given an untransformed reference, extracts the transforms for each piece per name, from either Geometry or Proxy Geometry, and applies them to the geometry with the corresponding name attribute.

classes.name: RBD Material Fracture
classes.description: Fractures the input geometry based on a material type.

classes.name: RBD Pack
classes.description: Packs RBD geometry, constraints, and proxy geometry into a single geometry.

classes.name: RBD Paint
classes.description: Paints values onto geometry or constraints using strokes.

classes.name: RBD Transform
classes.description: The RBD Transform operator performs a Transform operation on all 3 source geometries (Geometry, Constraint Geometry and Proxy Geometry) at once.

classes.name: RBD Unpack
classes.description: Unpacks an RBD setup into three outputs.

classes.name: RMan Shader
classes.description: Attaches RenderMan shaders to groups of faces.

classes.description: Export animation from geometry-based skeleton to an FBX file.

classes.name: ROP FBX Character Output
classes.description: Export a skinned character with geometry-based skeleton to an FBX file.

classes.name: ROP GLTF Character Output
classes.description: Export a skinned character with a geometry-based skeleton to a glTF or glb (binary) file.

classes.name: Ragdoll Collision Shapes
classes.description: Creates collision shapes for a KineFX skeleton to be used in a ragdoll RBD simulation.

classes.name: Ragdoll Solver
classes.description: Runs a ragdoll RBD simulation on the target skeleton.

classes.name: Rails
classes.description:
Generates surfaces by stretching cross-sections between
two guide rails.

classes.name: Raw Import
classes.description: Imports raw binary files as point, detail, or volumes.

classes.name: Ray
classes.description: Projects one surface onto another.

classes.name: Refine
classes.description:
Increases the number of points/CVs in a curve or surface
without changing its shape.

classes.name: Reguide
classes.description: Scatters new guides, interpolating the properties of existing guides.

classes.name: Remesh
classes.description: Recreates the shape of the input surface using high-quality (nearly equilateral) triangles.

classes.name: Remesh Bubbles
classes.description: Generates foam bubble like structure onto a point cloud.

classes.name: Remesh to Camera
classes.description: Subdivide input geometry to generate polygons smaller than a camera measurement.

classes.name: Remesh to Grid
classes.description: Rebuilds polygonal topology to straighten edges, close small holes, and remove interior geometry.

classes.name: Repack
classes.description: Repacks geometry as an embedded primitive.

classes.name: Resample
classes.description: Resamples one or more curves or surfaces into even length segments.

classes.name: Rest Position
classes.description:
Creates rest attributes on the geometry so procedural
textures stay put on the surface as it deforms.

classes.name: Retime
classes.description: Retimes the time-dependent input geometry.

classes.name: Reverse
classes.description: Reverses or cycles the vertex order of faces.

classes.name: Reverse Foot
classes.description: Creates a reverse foot set up for the given input skeleton.

classes.name: Revolve
classes.description: Revolves a curve around a center axis to sweep out a surface.

classes.name: Rewire Vertices
classes.description: Rewires vertices to different points specified by an attribute.

classes.name: Rig Attribute VOP
classes.description: Runs a VOP network to modify geometry attributes on a KineFX rig.

classes.name: Rig Attribute Wrangle
classes.description: Runs a VEX snippet to modify transform attribute values on a KineFX rig.

classes.name: Rig Copy Transforms
classes.description: Attach the joints of a skeleton SOP to another, posed skeleton.

classes.name: Rig Doctor
classes.description: Optimizes and runs checks on a SOP skeleton.

classes.name: Rig Match Pose
classes.description: Conforms the rest poses of two skeletons in preparation for retargeting.

classes.name: Rig Mirror Pose
classes.description: Mirrors a SOP skeleton’s pose.

classes.name: Rig Pose
classes.description: Poses and animates a SOP rig or skeleton.

classes.name: Rig Python
classes.description: Runs a Python snippet to modify the incoming rig geometry.

classes.name: Rig Stash Pose
classes.description: Stores a static pose on a skeleton as a matrix point attribute.

classes.name: Ripple
classes.description:
Generates ripples by displacing points along the up direction
specified.

classes.name: Ripple Solver
classes.description: Runs ripple simulations on geometry surfaces.

classes.name: Room Map Frame
classes.description: Setup geometry for usage with Karma Room Map

classes.name: Scatter
classes.description: Scatters new points randomly across a surface or through a volume.

classes.name: Scatter and Align
classes.description: Scatters points across a surface with randomized scale and orientation attributes for use with Copy to Points.

classes.name: Scatter in Texture Mask
classes.description: Scatters points on a mesh, with density controlled by a texture.

classes.name: Scene Character Export
classes.description: Export animation from a geometry-based character to the Scene (OBJ) context.

classes.name: Scene Character Import
classes.description: Creates a geometry-based character with animation from the Scene (OBJ) context.

classes.name: Script
classes.description: Runs scripts when cooked.

classes.name: Sculpt
classes.description: Interactively reshape a surface using brushes that push, pull, flatten, smooth, or otherwise deform the mesh similarly to how one would sculpt a clay model.

classes.name: Secondary Motion
classes.description: Adds secondary motion effects to a static or animated input KineFX joint, skeleton, or character.

classes.name: Sequence Blend
classes.description: Morphs though a sequence of 3D shapes, interpolating geometry and attributes.

classes.name: Set T-Pose
classes.description: Stores the rest position for the input bone, muscle, or tissue geometry.

classes.name: Shallow Water Solver
classes.description: Runs shallow water simulations on height fields.

classes.name: Shape Diff
classes.description: Computes the post-deform or pre-deform difference of two geometries with similar topologies.

classes.name: Shrinkwrap
classes.description: Computes the convex hull of the input geometry and moves its polygons inwards along their normals.

classes.name: Skeleton
classes.description: Interactively creates and edits geometry-based skeletons.

classes.name: Skeleton Blend
classes.description: Blends the poses of multiple skeletons.

classes.name: Skeleton Mirror
classes.description: Modifies an input skeleton by duplicating joints across a mirror plane.

classes.name: Skin
classes.description: Builds a skin surface between any number of shape curves.

classes.name: Skin Properties
classes.description: Creates and modifies skin attributes in preparation for the skin solver.

classes.name: Skin Solidify
classes.description: Converts surface geometry to a solid (tetrahedrons) and prepares the output geometry for solving with a skin solver.

classes.name: Skin Solver Vellum
classes.description: Computes the dynamics simulation for the skin pass using Vellum.

classes.name: Sky Box
classes.description: Creates a volume filled with volumetric clouds.

classes.name: Sky Field
classes.description: Generates an initial Sky Field volume to use with sky tools.

classes.name: Sky Field Noise
classes.description: Modifies a Sky Field using 2D cloud noise.

classes.name: Sky Field Pattern
classes.description: Modifies a Sky Field using a 2D cloud pattern.

classes.name: Sky Field from Map
classes.description: Modifies a Sky Field using an image saved on your disk.

classes.name: Smooth
classes.description: Smooths out (or relaxes) polygons, meshes and curves without increasing the number of points.

classes.name: Smooth Motion
classes.description: Smooths out unwanted noise in an animated input points or KineFX joint, skeleton, or MotionClip.

classes.name: Soft Peak
classes.description:
Moves the selected point along its normal, with smooth rolloff to
surrounding points.

classes.name: Soft Transform
classes.description: Moves the selected point, with smooth rolloff to surrounding points.

classes.name: Solid Fracture
classes.description: Creates a partition of a tetrahedral mesh that can be used for finite-element fracturing.

classes.name: Solver
classes.description: Allows running a SOP network iteratively over some input geometry, with the output of the network from the previous frame serving as the input for the network at the current frame.

classes.name: Sort
classes.description: Reorders points and primitives in different ways, including randomly.

classes.name: Sphere
classes.description: Creates a sphere or ovoid surface.

classes.name: Spiral
classes.description: Creates spirals and helices.

classes.name: Spline Align
classes.description: Aligns a group of primitives to each other or to an auxiliary input.

classes.name: Spline Basis
classes.description:
Provides operations for moving knots within the parametric space
of a NURBS curve or surface.

classes.name: Spline Cap
classes.description: Closes open areas with flat or rounded coverings.

classes.name: Spline Clay
classes.description:
Lets you deform NURBS faces and NURBS surfaces by pulling points that lie
directly on them.

classes.name: Spline Creep
classes.description: Deforms and animates a piece of geometry across a surface.

classes.name: Spline Curve Clay
classes.description: Deforms a spline surface by reshaping a curve on the surface.

classes.name: Spline Fillet
classes.description: Creates smooth bridging geometry between two curves or surfaces.

classes.name: Spline Fit
classes.description: Fits a spline curve to points, or a spline surface to a mesh of points.

classes.name: Spline Profile
classes.description: Extracts or manipulates profile curves.

classes.name: Spline Project
classes.description: Creates profile curves on surfaces.

classes.name: Spline Round
classes.description: Generates round fillets of a specified radius between two surfaces.

classes.name: Spline Surfsect
classes.description:
Trims or creates profile curves along the intersection lines
between NURBS or bezier surfaces.

classes.name: Spline Trim
classes.description:
Trims away parts of a spline surface defined by a profile curve
or untrims previous trims.

classes.name: Split
classes.description: Splits primitives or points into two streams.

classes.name: Spray Paint
classes.description: Spray paints random points onto a surface.

classes.name: Sprite
classes.description: A SOP node that sets the sprite display for points.

classes.name: Stabilize Joint
classes.description: Removes jitter from the input animation and handles geometry snapping of joints.

classes.name: Starburst
classes.description: Insets points on polygonal faces.

classes.name: Stash
classes.description: Caches the input geometry in the node on command, and then uses it as the node’s output.

classes.name: Stitch
classes.description: Stretches two curves or surfaces to cover a smooth area.

classes.name: Stroke
classes.description: Low level tool for building interactive assets.

classes.name: Subdivide
classes.description: Subdivides polygons into smoother, higher-resolution polygons.

classes.name: Subnetwork
classes.description: The Subnet op is essentially a way of creating a macro to represent a collection of ops as a single op in the Network Editor.

classes.name: Super Quad
classes.description: Generates an isoquadric surface.

classes.name: Surface Deform
classes.description: Deforms points using a polygon surface.

classes.name: Sweep
classes.description: Creates a surface by sweeping a cross section curve along a spine curve.

classes.name: Switch
classes.description: Switches between network branches based on an expression or keyframe animation.

classes.name: Switch-If
classes.description: Switches between two network branches based on an expression or geometry test.

classes.name: TOP Geometry
classes.description: Sends input geometry to a TOP subnet and retrieves the output geometry.

classes.name: TOP Network
classes.description: The TOP Network operator contains SOP nodes for running tasks.

classes.name: Table Import
classes.description: Reads a CSV file creating point per row.

classes.name: Tangent Field
classes.description: Creates a smooth tangent (multi-) vector field on a polygonal surface.

classes.description: Creates a capybara, which can be used as test geometry.

classes.name: Test Geometry: Electra
classes.description: Creates Electra, the test KineFX character.

classes.description: Creates a pig head, which can be used as test geometry..

classes.name: Test Geometry: Rubber Toy
classes.description: Creates a rubber toy, which can be used as test geometry.

classes.description: Creates a shader ball, which can be used to test shaders.

classes.name: Test Geometry: Squab
classes.description: Creates a squab, which can be used as test geometry.

classes.description: Creates a template body, which can be used as test geometry.

classes.name: Test Geometry: Template Head
classes.description: Creates a template head, which can be used as test geometry.

classes.name: Test Geometry: Tommy
classes.description: Creates a soldier, which can be used as test geometry.

classes.description: Provides a simple crowd simulation for testing transitions between animation clips.

classes.description: Provides a simple Bullet simulation for testing the behavior of a ragdoll.

classes.name: Tet Conform
classes.description: Creates a tetrahedral mesh that conforms to a connected mesh as much as possible.

classes.name: Tet Embed
classes.description: Creates a simple tetrahedral mesh that covers a connected mesh.

classes.description: Partitions a given tetrahedron mesh into groups of tets isolated by a given polygon mesh

classes.name: Texture Mask Paint
classes.description: Paints a mask into a texture map.

classes.description: An operator that uses computer vision to track movement between two textures embedded as two-dimensional volumes.

classes.description: Cooks the input at a different time.

classes.name: Tissue Properties
classes.description: Creates and modifies tissue attributes in preparation for the tissue solver.

classes.name: Tissue Solidify
classes.description: Converts surface geometry to a layered solid (tetrahedrons) and prepares the output geometry for solving with a tissue solver.

classes.name: Tissue Solver Vellum
classes.description: Computes the dynamics simulation for the Tissue pass using Vellum.

classes.description: Deforms a surface to match the size, shape, and texture of a different surface.

classes.name: Topo Flow Sample

An operator that uses computer vision to identify distinct feature points in

classes.name: Topo Landmark
classes.description:
A state interface to establish correspondence from points on one surface 
to points on another surface.

classes.description: Non-rigidly deforms a surface to match the size and shape of a different surface.

classes.name: TopoBuild
classes.description: Lets you interactively draw a reduced quad mesh automatically snapped to existing geometry.

classes.name: Torus
classes.description: Creates a torus (doughnut) shaped surface.

classes.name: Trace
classes.description: Traces curves from an image file or heightfield.

classes.name: Trail
classes.description: Creates trails behind points.

classes.name: Transform
classes.description: The Transform operation transforms the source geometry in object space using a transformation matrix.

classes.name: Transform Axis
classes.description: Transforms the input geometry relative to a specific axis.

classes.name: Transform By Attribute
classes.description: Transforms the input geometry by a point attribute.

classes.name: Transform Pieces
classes.description: Transforms input geometry according to transformation attributes on template geometry.

classes.name: Tri Bezier
classes.description: Creates a triangular Bezier surface.

classes.name: TriDivide
classes.description: Refines triangular meshes using various metrics.

classes.name: Triangulate 2D
classes.description: Connects points to form well-shaped triangles.

classes.name: Tube
classes.description: Creates open or closed tubes, cones, or pyramids.

classes.name: USD Animation Import
classes.description: Imports a skeleton and animation from a UsdSkel character.

classes.name: USD Character Import
classes.description: Imports the rest geometry, skeleton, and animation from a UsdSkel character.

classes.name: USD Skin Import
classes.description: Imports skinned geometry from a UsdSkel character.

classes.name: UV Autoseam
classes.description: Generates an edge group representing suggested seams for flattening a polygon model in UV space.

classes.name: UV Brush
classes.description: Adjusts texture coordinates in the UV viewport by painting.

classes.name: UV Edit
classes.description: Lets you interactively move UVs in the texture view.

classes.name: UV Flatten
classes.description: Creates flattened pieces in texture space from 3D geometry.

classes.name: UV Fuse
classes.description: Merges UVs.

classes.name: UV Layout
classes.description: Packs UV islands efficiently into a limited area.

classes.name: UV Pelt
classes.description: Relaxes UVs by pulling them out toward the edges of the texture area.

classes.name: UV Project
classes.description:
Assigns UVs by projecting them onto the surface from
a set direction.

classes.name: UV Quick Shade
classes.description: Applies an image file as a textured shader to a surface.

classes.name: UV Texture
classes.description:
Assigns texture UV coordinates to geometry
for use in texture and bump mapping.

classes.name: UV Transform
classes.description: Transforms UV texture coordinates on the source geometry.

classes.name: UV Unwrap
classes.description: Separates UVs into reasonably flat, non-overlapping groups.

classes.name: Unix
classes.description: Processes geometry using an external program.

classes.name: Unpack
classes.description: Unpacks packed primitives.

classes.name: Unpack Folder
classes.description: Extracts contents from a packed folder structure.

classes.name: Unpack Points
classes.description: Unpacks points from packed primitives.

classes.name: Unpack USD
classes.description: Converts packed USD primitives into normal Houdini geometry.

classes.name: Unpaste
classes.description:
The Unpaste op removes one or more pasted surfaces from a paste
hierarchy, causing the hierarchy to update.

classes.name: VDB
classes.description: Creates one or more empty/uniform VDB volume primitives.

classes.name: VDB Activate
classes.description: Activates voxel regions of a VDB for further processing.

classes.name: VDB Activate SDF
classes.description: Expand or contract signed distance fields stored on VDB volume primitives.

classes.name: VDB Advect
classes.description: Moves VDBs in the input geometry along a VDB velocity field.

classes.name: VDB Advect Points
classes.description: Moves points in the input geometry along a VDB velocity field.

classes.name: VDB Analysis
classes.description: Computes an analytic property of a VDB volumes, such as gradient or curvature.

classes.name: VDB Clip
classes.description: Clips VDB volume primitives using a bounding box or another VDB as a mask.

classes.name: VDB Collider
classes.description: Defines VDB colliders to bounce or kill dynamic objects.

classes.name: VDB Combine
classes.description: Combines the values of two VDB volumes in various ways.

classes.name: VDB Convex Clip SDF
classes.description: Clips an SDF VDB by a convex hull.

classes.name: VDB Diagnostics
classes.description: Tests VDBs for Bad Values and Repairs.

classes.name: VDB Extrapolate
classes.description: Extrapolate a VDB signed distance field.

classes.name: VDB Fracture
classes.description: Cuts level set VDB volume primitives into multiple pieces.

classes.name: VDB LOD
classes.description: Build an LOD Pyramid from a VDB.

classes.name: VDB Merge
classes.description: Combines many VDB volumes in various ways.

classes.name: VDB Morph SDF
classes.description: Blends between source and target SDF VDBs.

classes.name: VDB Occlusion Mask
classes.description: Create a mask of the voxels in shadow from a camera for VDB primitives.

classes.name: VDB Points Delete
classes.description: Deletes points inside of VDB Points primitives.

classes.name: VDB Points Group
classes.description: Manipulates the Internal Groups of a VDB Points Primitive.

classes.name: VDB Potential Flow
classes.description: Computes the steady-state air flow around VDB obstacles.

classes.name: VDB Project Non-Divergent
classes.description: Removes divergence from a Vector VDB.

classes.name: VDB Rasterize Frustum
classes.description: Rasterize points into density and attribute volumes.

classes.name: VDB Renormalize SDF
classes.description: Fixes signed distance fields stored in VDB volume primitives.

classes.name: VDB Resample
classes.description: Re-samples a VDB volume primitive into a new orientation and/or voxel size.

classes.name: VDB Reshape SDF
classes.description: Reshapes signed distance fields in VDB volume primitives.

classes.name: VDB Segment by Connectivity
classes.description: Splits SDF VDBs into connected components.

classes.name: VDB Smooth
classes.description: Smooths out the values in a VDB volume primitive.

classes.name: VDB Smooth SDF
classes.description: Smooths out SDF values in a VDB volume primitive.

classes.name: VDB Topology to SDF
classes.description: Creates an SDF VDB based on the active set of another VDB.

classes.name: VDB Vector Split
classes.description: Splits a vector VDB primitive into three scalar VDB primitives.

classes.name: VDB Vector from Scalar
classes.description: Merges three scalar VDB into one vector VDB.

classes.name: VDB Visualize Tree
classes.description: Replaces a VDB volume with geometry that visualizes its structure.

classes.name: VDB from Particle Fluid
classes.description: Generates a signed distance field (SDF) VDB volume representing the surface of a set of particles from a particle fluid simulation.

classes.name: VDB from Particles
classes.description: Converts point clouds and/or point attributes into VDB volume primitives.

classes.name: VDB from Polygons
classes.description: Converts polygonal surfaces and/or surface attributes into VDB volume primitives.

classes.name: VDB to Spheres
classes.description: Fills a VDB volume with adaptively-sized spheres.

classes.name: Vellum Attach Constraints
classes.description: Edit or create new vellum attach to geometry and stitch constraints, interactively.

classes.name: Vellum Brush
classes.description: Interactive brushing of Vellum geometry, grains, and fluids in the viewport.

classes.name: Vellum Configure Grain
classes.description: Configures geometry for Vellum Grain constraints.

classes.name: Vellum Constraint Properties
classes.description: Modifies common Vellum Constraint properties.

classes.name: Vellum Constraints
classes.description: Configure constraints on geometry for the Vellum solvers.

classes.name: Vellum Drape
classes.description: Vellum solver setup to pre-roll fabric to drape over characters.

classes.name: Vellum I/O
classes.description: Packs Vellum simulations, saves them to disk, and loads them back again.

classes.name: Vellum Pack
classes.description: Packs Vellum geometry and constraints into a single geometry.

classes.name: Vellum Post-Process
classes.description: Applies common post-processing effects to the result of Vellum solves.

classes.name: Vellum Reference Frame
classes.description: Ties Vellum points to a reference frame defined by moving geometry.

classes.name: Vellum Rest Blend
classes.description: Blends the current rest values of constraints with a rest state calculated from external geometry.

classes.name: Vellum Solver
classes.description: Runs a dynamic Vellum simulation.

classes.name: Vellum Transform Pieces
classes.description: Transforms geometry using the rest and solved data from Vellum Shape Match constraints.

classes.name: Vellum Unpack
classes.description: Unpacks a Vellum simulation into two outputs.

classes.name: Verify BSDF
classes.description: Verify that a bsdf conforms to the required interface.

classes.name: Visibility
classes.description: Shows/hides primitives in the 3D viewer and UV editor.

classes.name: Visualize Properties
classes.description: Lets you adjust display options and attach visualizers to geometry.

classes.name: Visualize Rig
classes.description: Visualizes the transformations and parenting of a SOP skeleton.

classes.name: Volume
classes.description: Creates a volume primitive.

classes.name: Volume Adjust Fog
classes.description: Modifies values on the incoming Volume and VDB primitives.

classes.name: Volume Ambient Occlusion
classes.description: A node that generates the ambient occlusion field of the provided density field.

classes.name: Volume Analysis
classes.description: Computes analytic properties of volumes.

classes.name: Volume Arrival Time
classes.description: Computes a speed-defined travel time from source points to voxels.

classes.name: Volume Blur
classes.description: Blurs the voxels of a volume.

classes.name: Volume Bound
classes.description: Bounds voxel data.

classes.name: Volume Break
classes.description: Cuts polygonal objects using a signed distance field volume.

classes.name: Volume Combine
classes.description: Combines multiple volumes or VDBs within one geometry into a new volume or VDB.

classes.name: Volume Compress
classes.description: Re-compresses Volume Primitives.

classes.name: Volume Convolve 3×3×3
classes.description: Convolves a volume by a 3×3×3 kernel.

classes.name: Volume Deform
classes.description: Deform a volume using lattice points.

classes.name: Volume FFT
classes.description: Compute the Fast Fourier Transform of volumes.

classes.name: Volume Feather
classes.description: Feathers the edges of volumes.

classes.name: Volume Merge
classes.description: Flattens many volumes into one volume.

classes.name: Volume Mix
classes.description: Combines the scalar fields of volume primitives.

classes.name: Volume Noise Fog
classes.description: Adds or generates noise in volume/VDB primitives.

classes.name: Volume Noise SDF
classes.description: Adds or generates noise and displaces an SDF.

classes.name: Volume Noise Vector
classes.description: Adds or generates noise in a Vector volume/VDB.

classes.name: Volume Normalize Weights
classes.description: Ensure a set of volumes add up to one.

classes.name: Volume Optical Flow
classes.description: Translates the motion between two image volumes into displacement vectors.

classes.name: Volume Patch
classes.description: Fill in a region of a volume with features from another volume.

classes.name: Volume Ramp
classes.description: Remaps a volume according to a ramp.

classes.name: Volume Rasterize
classes.description: Rasterizes into a volume.

classes.name: Volume Rasterize Attributes
classes.description: Samples point attributes into VDBs.

classes.name: Volume Rasterize Curve
classes.description: Converts a curve into a volume.

classes.name: Volume Rasterize Hair
classes.description: Converts fur or hair to a volume for rendering.

classes.name: Volume Rasterize Lattice
classes.description: Deform a volume using lattice points.

classes.name: Volume Rasterize Particles
classes.description: Converts a point cloud into a volume.

classes.name: Volume Rasterize Points
classes.description: Converts a point cloud into a volume.

classes.name: Volume Reduce
classes.description: Reduces the values of a volume into a single number.

classes.name: Volume Resample
classes.description: Resamples the voxels of a volume to a new resolution.

classes.name: Volume Resize
classes.description: Resizes the bounds of a volume without changing voxels.

classes.name: Volume SDF
classes.description: Builds a Signed Distance Field from an isocontour of a volume.

classes.name: Volume Slice
classes.description: Extracts 2d slices from volumes.

classes.name: Volume Splice
classes.description: Splices overlapping volume primitives together.

classes.name: Volume Stamp
classes.description: Stamps volumes instanced on points into a single target volume.

classes.name: Volume Surface
classes.description: Adaptively surfaces a volume hierarchy with a regular triangle mesh.

classes.name: Volume Trail
classes.description: Computes a trail of points through a velocity volume.

classes.name: Volume VOP
classes.description: Runs CVEX on a set of volume primitives.

classes.name: Volume Vector Join
classes.description: Merges multiple scalar Volumes into a vector Volume..

classes.name: Volume Vector Split
classes.description: Splits a vector Volume primitive into scalar Volume primitives.

classes.name: Volume Velocity
classes.description: Computes a velocity volume.

classes.name: Volume Velocity from Curves
classes.description: Generates a volume velocity field using curve tangents.

classes.name: Volume Velocity from Surface
classes.description: Generates a velocity field within a surface geometry.

classes.name: Volume Visualization
classes.description: Adjusts attributes for multi-volume visualization.

classes.name: Volume Wrangle
classes.description: Runs a VEX snippet to modify voxel values in a volume.

classes.name: Volume from Attribute
classes.description: Sets the voxels of a volume from point attributes.

classes.name: Voronoi Adjacency
classes.description: Create a line segment between points with adjacent Voronoi cells

classes.name: Voronoi Fracture
classes.description: Fractures the input geometry by performing a Voronoi decomposition of space around the input cell points

classes.name: Voronoi Fracture Points
classes.description:
Given an object and points of impact on the object, this SOP
generates a set of points that can be used as input to the Voronoi
Fracture SOP to simulate fracturing the
object from those impacts.

classes.name: Voronoi Split
classes.description:
Cuts the geometry into small pieces according to a set of cuts
defined by polylines.

classes.name: Vortex Force Attributes
classes.description: Creates the point attributes needed to create a Vortex Force DOP.

classes.name: Weight Array Biharmonic
classes.description:
Fills in index and weight array pairs for points on a mesh using biharmonic
functions.

classes.name: Weight Array Interpolate
classes.description: Evaluates weight arrays specified on points on a mesh at a given point within a primitive.

classes.name: Whitewater Post-Process
classes.description: Prepares the whitewater simulation for rendering.

classes.name: Whitewater Solver
classes.description: Sets and configures a Whitewater simulation inside a SOP network.

classes.name: Whitewater Source
classes.description: Generates the emission field for whitewater simulations.

classes.name: Winding Number
classes.description: Computes generalized winding number of surface at query points.

classes.name: Wire Blend
classes.description: Morphs between curve shapes while maintaining curve length.

classes.name: Wire Capture
classes.description:
Captures surfaces to a wire,
allowing you to edit the wire to deform the surface.

classes.name: Wire Deform
classes.description: Deforms geometry captured to a curve via the Wire Capture node.

classes.name: Wire Transfer
classes.description: Transfers the shape of one curve to another.

classes.name: Wireframe
classes.description: Constructs polygonal tubes around polylines, creating renderable geometry.

classes.name: Wrinkle Deformer
classes.description: Deforms geometry to simulate surface wrinkles.

classes.name: Add Variant
classes.description: Adds one or more variants to a variant set on a primitive. This node creates the primitive if it doesn’t exist.

classes.name: Additional Render Vars
classes.description: Create multiple render vars.

classes.name: Asset Reference
classes.description: Reference, Transform, and select variants of a USD Asset.

classes.name: Assign Material
classes.description: Assigns a material to one or more USD primitives. You can use also programmatically assign materials using VEX, programmatically override material settings for each assignment, and programmatically assign materials to geometry subsets.

classes.name: Assign Prototypes
classes.description: Switch point instances or USD instanceable prims to instance a different prototype.

classes.name: Attribute VOP
classes.description: Create/edit USD attribute values using a VOP network.

classes.name: Attribute Wrangle
classes.description: Create/edit USD primitive attributes using a VEX snippet.

classes.name: Auto Select LOD
classes.description: Automatically selects a level-of-detail variant based on the primitive’s distance from the camera.

classes.name: Background Plate
classes.description: Sets up hold-out or matte objects that leave holes in the scene through which the background is visible. These prims still take shadows and contribute to reflections as if they were the background.

classes.name: Bake Skinning
classes.description: Bakes animation driven by a UsdSkel into transforms and point positions.

classes.name: Basis Curves
classes.description: Creates or edits a basis curves shape primitive.

classes.name: Begin Context Options Block
classes.description: This node begins a block of LOP nodes, within which certain context options have certain values.

classes.name: Blend
classes.description: Partially applies edits to a layer’s attributes based on a fractional weight.

classes.name: Blend Constraint
classes.description: Blends transforms according to a list of weights specified as parameters.

classes.name: Cache
classes.description: Caches the results of cooking the network at different times, increasing playback speed.

classes.name: Camera
classes.description: Adds a USD camera to the scene.

classes.name: Capsule
classes.description: Creates or edits a capsule (tube with hemispherical ends) shape primitive.

classes.name: Collection
classes.description: Creates/edits collections using primitive patterns.

classes.name: Component Geometry
classes.description: Geometry container or import source, in a network created by the Component Builder tool.

classes.name: Component Geometry Variants
classes.description: Sets up geometry variants, in a network created by the Component Builder tool.

classes.name: Component Material
classes.description: Assigns materials to geometry in a network created by the Component Builder tool.

classes.name: Component Output
classes.description: Assembles the final Component prim, in a network created by the Component Builder tool.

classes.name: Cone
classes.description: Creates or edits a cone shape primitive.

classes.name: Configure Layer
classes.description: Edits metadata on a layer.

classes.name: Configure Primitives
classes.description: Edits various metadata on one or more primitives.

classes.name: Configure Properties
classes.description: Configures metadata on properties (relationships and attributes).

classes.name: Configure Stage
classes.description: Configures metadata for how to load layers into the stage and asset resolution.

classes.name: Coordinate System
classes.description: Define named coordinate systems used in shaders.

classes.name: Copy Property
classes.description: Copy properties from one primitive to another, or renames properties on a primitive.

classes.name: Create LOD
classes.description: Uses the PolyReduce SOP to automatically generate multiple levels of detail from a high-res model, and stores them as USD variants.

classes.name: Cube
classes.description: Creates or edits a cube shape primitive.

classes.name: Cylinder
classes.description: Creates or edits a cylinder shape primitive.

classes.name: Distant Light
classes.description: Creates or edits a USD Distant Light, representing a far-off light source such as the sun. Adds some useful Karma-specific attributes.

classes.name: Dome Light
classes.description: Creates or edits a USD Dome Light prim. A dome light emits light inward, simulating light coming from the sky/environment surrounding the scene.

classes.name: Draw Mode
classes.description: Sets draw mode properties on USD model assets.

classes.name: Drop
classes.description: Runs a simulation to drop primitives under gravity.

classes.name: Duplicate
classes.description: Creates copies of a prim (and its descendants).

classes.name: Edit
classes.description: Interactively transforms prims in the viewer. Can use physics collisions to position props realistically.

classes.name: Edit Context Options
classes.description:
Houdini 20.5
                        


                            Nodes
                        


                            LOP nodes

classes.name: Edit Material
classes.description: Allows you to edit an existing USD material by modifying parameters and shader connections. This can be useful if the existing material is on a non-editable layer.

classes.name: Edit Material Properties
classes.description: Lets you build a spare parameter interface that reflects material or shader input attributes to directly edit their values.

classes.name: Edit Properties
classes.description: Lets you build a spare parameter interface to directly edit attribute and relationship values.

classes.name: Edit Properties From Node
classes.description: Lets you refer to the parameter on another node to directly edit attribute and relationship values.

classes.name: Edit Prototypes
classes.description: Modify the prototypes of native or point instances in-place, without disturbing the instancing setup.

classes.name: Edit Target Layer
classes.description: Allows you to apply edits directly in a lower layer, instead of overriding prims and attributes  in the active layer.

classes.name: Error
classes.description: Generates a message, warning, or error, which can show up on a parent asset.

classes.name: Explore Variants
classes.description: Visualize, set, or extract variants on primitives.

classes.name: Extract Instances
classes.description: Converts (heroes) an instance into a real editable prim.

classes.name: Fetch
classes.description: Grabs the output of another LOP, potentially in another LOP network.

classes.name: File Cache
classes.description: Caches (writes out once and then reads from) USD layers (possibly animated) to disk.

classes.name: Follow Path Constraint
classes.description: Constrains a prim to follow a path curve.

classes.name: For Each
classes.description: The end node of a For-Each loop block.

classes.name: Geometry Clip Sequence
classes.description:
Houdini 20.5
                        


                            Nodes
                        


                            LOP nodes

classes.name: Geometry Color
classes.description: Adds display color and display opacity primvars to geometry.

classes.name: Geometry Sequence
classes.description: Imports a sequence of geometry files into LOPs as animated geometry.

classes.name: Geometry Subset VOP
classes.description: Creates USD geometry subsets within geometry prims (similar to groups in SOPs) based on evaluating a VEXpression or VOP network.

classes.name: Graft Branches
classes.description: Takes prims/branches from the second input and attaches them onto branches of the scene graph tree in the first input.

classes.name: Graft Stages
classes.description: Takes scene graph trees from other inputs and attaches them onto branches of the scene graph tree in the first input.

classes.name: HDA Dynamic Payload
classes.description: Cooks a OBJ or SOP asset on disk and imports the animated geometry output as a USD payload.

classes.name: Hermite Curves
classes.description: Creates or edits a hermite curves shape primitive.

classes.name: Houdini Feather Procedural
classes.description: Generates feathers for rendering.

classes.name: Houdini Preview Procedurals
classes.description: Invokes Houdini Procedurals while working interactively.

classes.name: Houdini Procedural: Crowd
classes.description: Houdini Crowd Procedural for Solaris.

classes.name: Houdini Procedural: Hair
classes.description: Houdini Hair Procedural for Solaris.

classes.name: Houdini Procedural: Ocean
classes.description: Houdini Ocean Procedural for Solaris.

classes.name: Houdini Procedural: RBD
classes.description: Houdini RBD Procedural for Solaris.

classes.name: Inline USD
classes.description: Parses usda code representing a layer and adds it to the layer stack.

classes.name: Insertion Point
classes.description: Represents a point in the node graph where nodes can be inserted.

classes.name: Instancer
classes.description: Instances or copies primitives onto points.

classes.name: Isolate Scene
classes.description: Work in masked areas of the stage.

classes.name: Karma
classes.description: Renders the USD scene using Houdini’s Karma renderer.

classes.name: Karma Cryptomatte
classes.description: Setup Cryptomatte AOVs for Karma.

classes.name: Karma Fog Box
classes.description: Creates a constant volume within a box.

classes.name: Karma Physical Sky
classes.description: Creates a Karma Sky Dome and Sun Light rig.

classes.name: Karma Render Products
classes.description: Create multiple render products sharing common settings.

classes.name: Karma Render Properties
classes.description: Configure Render Properties for Karma.

classes.name: Karma Sky Atmosphere
classes.description: Creates or edits a Karma Sky Atmosphere.

classes.name: Karma Sky Dome Light
classes.description: Creates or edits a Karma Sky Dome Light.

classes.name: Karma Standard Render Vars
classes.description: Create standard karma render vars (AOVs/Image Planes).

classes.name: LPE Tag
classes.description: Manage Lights' LPE Tags.

classes.name: Labs Biome Plant Scatter Import (Beta)
classes.description: Import a biome plant scatter from SOPs to LOPs.

classes.name: Labs Karma AOVs for RenderMan Denoiser
classes.description: Generates AOVs for the Pixar RenderMan denoiser.

classes.name: Labs ML CV Directory Variant
classes.description: Creates a variant set from USD assets in a directory.

classes.name: Labs ML CV Dome Camera
classes.description: Generates a camera from one of the random positions within a specified 3D camera dome and frames the focus object within the camera’s view.

classes.name: Labs ML CV Synthetics Karma Rop
classes.description: Renders RGB image or ID EXR file for segmentation masking.

classes.name: Layer Break
classes.description: Starts a new active sublayer that subsequent nodes will edit, and indicates all previous layers will be discarded when saving to disk.

classes.name: Layer Replace
classes.description: Replaces all uses of a certain layer with a substitute layer from its second input.

classes.name: Layout
classes.description: Provides tools for populating a scene with instanced USD assets. You can place individual components, paint/scatter components in different ways using customizable brushes, and edit existing instances.

classes.name: Light
classes.description: Creates or edits a USD Light prim. This node also adds some useful Karma-specific attributes.

classes.name: Light Filter Library
classes.description: Authors USD light filter primitives from VOP nodes.

classes.name: Light Linker
classes.description: Creates USD light link properties based on rules.

classes.name: Light Mixer
classes.description: Lets you interactively edit USD properties for multiple lights.

classes.name: Load Layer for Editing
classes.description:
Houdini 20.5
                        


                            Nodes
                        


                            LOP nodes

classes.name: Loft Payload Info
classes.description: Adds basic information from inside a payload to the primitive that loads the payload.

classes.name: Look At Constraint
classes.description: Constrains a prim to always point toward a target.

classes.name: Mask from Bounds
classes.description: Sets a primvar based on whether/by how much selected prims are inside a bounding shape.

classes.name: Match Size
classes.description: Resizes and recenters the input geometry to match a reference bounding box.

classes.name: Material Library
classes.description: Authors USD material primitives from shader VOP nodes.

classes.name: Material Linker
classes.description: Creates material assignments based on rules.

classes.name: Material Variation
classes.description: Creates attributes/primvars to override material parameters per-prim/instance.

classes.name: Merge LOP
classes.description: Merges the layers from incoming stages into a unified layer stack.

classes.name: Merge Point Instancers
classes.description: Merges point instancers into a single consolidated point instancer.

classes.name: Mesh
classes.description: Creates or edits a mesh shape primitive.

classes.name: Modify Paths
classes.description: Modify asset path attribute values.

classes.name: Modify Point Instances
classes.description: Modifies point transforms and property values for individual point instances.

classes.name: Motion Blur
classes.description: Adds time samples to allow motion blur when rendering.

classes.name: Null
classes.description: This node does nothing. It can be useful to insert a Null into a network as a fixed point in the network that you can refer to by name in expressions/scripts.

classes.name: Output
classes.description: Represents the output of a subnetwork. Allows you to design a node asset with multiple outputs.

classes.name: Parent Constraint
classes.description: Makes a primitive appear to inherit the transform hierarchy of another prim somewhere else in the tree.

classes.name: Points
classes.description: Creates or edits a Points shape primitive.

classes.name: Points Constraint
classes.description: Position and Orient primitives using point positions from a geometry.

classes.name: Primitive
classes.description: Bulk-creates one or more attributes of a certain type.

classes.name: Prune
classes.description: Hides or deactivates primitives and point instances.

classes.name: Python Script
classes.description: Lets you write Python code in the node to use the USD API to directly manipulate the stage.

classes.name: RBD Destruction
classes.description: An example for a fracturing simulation in USD, also useful as a canned effect.

classes.name: Reference
classes.description: References the contents of a external USD files and/or layers created by other LOP nodes into a branch of the existing scene graph tree. Can also remove or replace existing references.

classes.name: Render Geometry Settings
classes.description: Applies renderer-specific geometry settings to geometry in the scene graph.

classes.name: Render Product
classes.description:
Creates or edits a UsdRenderProduct prim, which represents an output of a renderer (such as a rendered image file or other
file-like artifact produced by a renderer), with attributes configuring how to generate the product.

classes.name: Render Settings
classes.description: Creates or edits a UsdRenderSettings prim, which holds the general settings for rendering the scene.

classes.name: Render Var
classes.description: Specifies a custom variable computed by the renderer and/or shaders, either a shader output or a light path expression (LPE).

classes.name: Resample Transforms
classes.description: Generates interpolated transform time samples from existing time samples on USD prims.

classes.name: Restructure Scene Graph
classes.description: This node has various operations for editing prim paths, variant sets, and composition arcs.

classes.name: Retime Instances
classes.description: Offsets and/or scales the timing of animation on selected instances.

classes.name: SOP Character Import
classes.description: Imports a character or animation from a SOP network into the USD scene graph.

classes.name: SOP Create
classes.description: Lets you create geometry in a SOP subnetwork inside this node, so you can create geometry in-place in the LOP network instead of needing a separate SOP network.

classes.name: SOP Crowd Import
classes.description: Imports a crowd from a SOP network into the USD scene graph.

classes.name: SOP Import
classes.description: Imports geometry from a SOP network into the USD scene graph.

classes.name: SOP Modify
classes.description: Converts USD geometry into SOP geometry, runs the SOP subnet inside this node on the geometry, and converts the changes back to USD overrides.

classes.name: Scene Doctor
classes.description: Validates primitives on a USD stage.

classes.name: Scene Import
classes.description: Imports models, materials, and lights from the Object level into the LOP network.

classes.name: Scope
classes.description: Creates a scope primitive. Scope is the simplest form of grouping, and does not have a transform. Scopes can be useful for organizing the scene tree.

classes.name: Set Extents
classes.description: Sets the bounding box metadata of selected primitives.

classes.name: Set Variant
classes.description: Selects (switches to) one of the variants stored in a variant set on a primitive.

classes.name: Simulation Proxy
classes.description: Generates low-poly collison geometry suitable for physical simulation and creates a proxy relationship to the original model.

classes.name: Sphere
classes.description: Creates or edits a sphere shape primitive.

classes.name: Split Point Instancers
classes.description: Splits a point instancer into two or more instances, which divide up the original instances.

classes.name: Split Primitive
classes.description: Splits USD geometry prims into child primitives based on geometry subsets or primvar values.

classes.name: Split Scene
classes.description: This node splits a scene graph into two disjoint sets of primitives.

classes.name: Stage Manager
classes.description: Provides a convenient interface to reference in many files at once and place them in the scene graph tree.

classes.name: Store Parameter Values
classes.description: Lets you store temporary (unsaved) data in the stage.

classes.name: Sublayer
classes.description: Imports from USD files or other LOP node chains into as sublayers, or removes/replaces/reorders existing sublayers.

classes.name: Subnet
classes.description: Encapsulates a LOP subnetwork, allowing you to organize and hide parts of the network.

classes.name: Surface Constraint
classes.description: Constrain a prim to stick to a surface.

classes.name: Switch
classes.description: Passes through one of several inputs, based on a parameter choice or expression.

classes.name: TimeShift
classes.description: Outputs the stage as it is at a different point in the timeline.

classes.name: Transform
classes.description: Edits the transforms of selected USD primitives.

classes.name: Transform UV
classes.description: Moves, rotates, and scales texture coordinates on USD primitives.

classes.name: Transform by SOP Points
classes.description: Transforms USD primitives by SOP points with transform attributes.

classes.name: USD ROP
classes.description:

classes.name: Vary Material Assignment
classes.description: Assign different materials across a number of prims to create variation.

classes.name: Volume
classes.description: References volume data on disk into a volume prim containing field prims.

classes.name: Xform
classes.description: Creates or edits an Xform prim. Xform (and its sub-classes) represents a transform in the scene tree.

classes.name: Agent Cam
classes.description: Create and attach camera to a crowd agent.

classes.name: Alembic Archive
classes.description: Loads the objects from an Alembic scene archive (.abc) file into the object level.

classes.name: Alembic Xform
classes.description:
Loads only the transform from an object or objects in an Alembic scene 
archive (.abc).

classes.name: Ambient Light
classes.description: Adds a constant level of light to every surface in the scene (or in the light’s mask), coming from no specific direction.

classes.name: Auto Bone Chain Interface
classes.description: The Auto Bone Chain Interface is created by the IK from Objects and IK from Bones tools on the Rigging shelf.

classes.name: Blend
classes.description: Switches or blends between the transformations of several input objects.

classes.name: Blend Sticky
classes.description: Computes its transform by blending between the transforms of two or more sticky objects, allowing you to blend a position across a polygonal surface.

classes.name: Bone
classes.description:
The Bone Object is used to create hierarchies of limb-like objects
that form part of a hierarchy …

classes.name: Camera
classes.description: You can view your scene through a camera, and render from its point of view.

classes.description: The DOP Network Object contains a dynamic simulation.

classes.name: Environment Light
classes.description: Environment Lights provide background illumination from outside the scene.

classes.name: Extract Transform
classes.description: The Extract Transform Object gets its transform by comparing the points of two pieces of geometry.

classes.name: Fetch

The Fetch Object gets its transform by copying the transform of
another object.

classes.name: Geometry
classes.description:
Container for the geometry operators (SOPs) that define a modeled
object.

classes.name: Groom Merge
classes.description: Merges groom data from multiple objects into one.

classes.name: Guide Deform
classes.description: Moves the curves of a groom with animated skin.

classes.name: Guide Groom
classes.description:
Generates guide curves from a skin geometry and does further
processing on these using an editable SOP network contained within the node.

classes.name: Guide Simulate
classes.description: Runs a physics simulation on the input guides.

classes.name: Hair Card Generate
classes.description: Converts dense hair curves to a polygon card, keeping the style and shape of the groom.

classes.name: Hair Card Texture Example
classes.description: An example of how to create a texture for hair cards.

classes.name: Hair Generate
classes.description: Generates hair from a skin geometry and guide curves.

classes.name: Handle
classes.description: The Handle Object is an IK tool for manipulating bones.

classes.name: Indirect Light
classes.description: Indirect lights produce illumination that has reflected from other objects in the scene.

classes.name: Instance
classes.description: Instance Objects can instance other geometry, light, or even subnetworks of objects.

classes.name: LOP Import
classes.description: Imports transform data from a USD primitive in a LOP node.

classes.name: LOP Import Camera
classes.description: Imports a USD camera primitive from a LOP node.

classes.name: Labs Fire Presets
classes.description: Quickly generate and render fire simulations using presets for size varying from torch to small to 1m high and low

classes.name: Light
classes.description: Light Objects cast light on other objects in a scene.

classes.name: Light template
classes.description: A very limited light object without any built-in render properties. Use this only if you want to build completely custom light with your choice of properties.

classes.name: Microphone
classes.description:
The Microphone object specifies a listening point for the
SpatialAudio CHOP.

classes.name: Mocap Acclaim
classes.description: Import Acclaim motion capture.

classes.name: Mocap Biped 1
classes.description: A male character with motion captured animations.

classes.name: Mocap Biped 2
classes.description: A male character with motion captured animations.

classes.name: Mocap Biped 3
classes.description: A male character with motion captured animations.

classes.name: Null
classes.description:
Serves as a place-holder in the scene, usually for parenting. this object
does not render.

classes.name: Path
classes.description: The Path object creates an oriented curve (path)

classes.name: PathCV
classes.description: The PathCV object creates control vertices used by the Path object.

classes.name: Python Script
classes.description:
The Python Script object is a container for the geometry operators
(SOPs) that define a modeled object.

classes.name: Ragdoll Run Example
classes.description: Crowd example showing a simple ragdoll setup.

classes.name: Reference Image
classes.description: Container for the Compositing operators (COP2) that define a picture.

classes.name: Rivet
classes.description: Creates a rivet on an objects surface, usually for parenting.

classes.name: Simple Biped
classes.description: A simple and efficient animation rig with full controls.

classes.name: Simple Female
classes.description: A simple and efficient female character animation rig with full controls.

classes.name: Simple Male
classes.description: A simple and efficient male character animation rig with full controls.

classes.name: Sound
classes.description:
The Sound object defines a sound emission point for the Spatial Audio
chop.

classes.name: Stadium Crowds Example
classes.description: Crowd example showing a stadium setup

classes.name: Stereo Camera Rig
classes.description: Provides parameters to manipulate the interaxial lens distance as well as the zero parallax setting plane in the scene.

classes.name: Stereo Camera Template
classes.description: Serves as a basis for constructing a more functional stereo camera rig as a digital asset.

classes.name: Sticky
classes.description: Creates a sticky object based on the UV’s of a surface, usually for parenting.

classes.name: Street Crowd Example
classes.description: Crowd example showing a street setup with two agent groups

classes.name: Subnet
classes.description: Container for objects.

classes.name: Switcher
classes.description: Acts as a camera but switches between the views from other cameras.

classes.name: TOP Network
classes.description: The TOP Network operator contains object-level nodes for running tasks.

classes.name: VR Camera
classes.description: Camera supporting VR image rendering.

classes.name: Viewport Isolator
classes.description: A Python Script HDA providing per viewport isolation controls from selection.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: This output operator is used to write agent definition files.

classes.name: Alembic
classes.description: Exports the scene to an Alembic archive. Alembic is a common exchange format for moving geometry and animation between different 3D software packages.

classes.name: Archive Generator
classes.description:
Generates disk-based archives which can be
used by either mantra or RIB renderers.

classes.name: Bake Animation
classes.description: Bakes animation from object transforms and CHOP overrides.

classes.name: Bake Texture
classes.description: Generates a texture map from one or more objects' rendered appearance.

classes.name: Batch
classes.description: Renders the input ROP in a single batch job.

classes.name: Channel
classes.description:
The Channel output operator generates clip files from a particular
CHOP.

classes.name: Composite
classes.description: Renders images from a compositing network.

classes.name: DSM Merge
classes.description: Merges two or more deep shadow/camera map files.

classes.name: Dem Bones Skinning Converter
classes.description: Converts any non-changing topology deforming mesh sequence into a bone-based animation.

classes.name: Dynamics
classes.description: Saves the state of a DOP network simulation into files.

classes.name: Fetch
classes.description: Makes a dependency link to a ROP in a different network.

classes.name: Filmbox FBX
classes.description: Exports entire scenes to FBX files.

classes.name: Filmbox FBX Animation
classes.description: Export animation from geometry-based skeleton to an FBX file.

classes.name: Filmbox FBX Character
classes.description: Export a skinned character with geometry-based skeleton to an FBX file.

classes.name: Flipbook
classes.description: Render an image using the hardware-accelerated 3D viewport renderer.

classes.name: Frame Container
classes.description: Prevents frame dependency changes in the contained nodes from affecting its inputs.

classes.name: Frame Depedency
classes.description: Allows an output frame to depend on one or more input frames.

classes.name: GLTF Character
classes.description:

                            Nodes
                        


                            Render nodes

classes.name: Geometry
classes.description: Generates geometry files from a SOP or DOP network.

classes.name: Geometry Raw
classes.description: Generates raw binary files from a SOP or DOP network.

classes.name: HQueue Render
classes.description: HQueue, or Houdini Queue, is a distributed job scheduling system.

classes.name: HQueue Simulation
classes.description: HQueue, or Houdini Queue, is a distributed job scheduling system.

classes.name: Hair Card Texture
classes.description: Renders hair textures for use on hair cards.

classes.name: Image
classes.description: Writes the output of a COP network to disk.

classes.name: Karma
classes.description: Renders non-USD scenes using Houdini’s Karma renderer.

classes.name: Labs 3D Facebook Image
classes.description: Quickly render a 3D scene to a 2.5D image that can be uploaded to Facebook.

classes.name: Labs Flipbook Textures
classes.description: Renders, composites, and exports flipbook textures.

classes.name: Labs JSON Exporter
classes.description: Export geometry attibutes to a JSON file.

classes.name: Labs Marmoset Export
classes.description: The Marmoset Export ROP allows you to quickly generate an mview inside Houdini

classes.name: Labs Niagara ROP
classes.description: Export point caches to be used with Unreal’s Niagara particle system.

classes.name: Labs Sketchfab
classes.description: Uploads geometry to Sketchfab

classes.name: Labs Vertex Animation Textures
classes.description: Exports a mesh and a set of textures to be used with a shader for complex real-time effects, such as: soft-body deformation, rigid-body dynamics, dynamically remeshed geometries, and particle sprites.

classes.name: Labs ZibraVDB Compress
classes.description: Compresses a VDB sequence and caches it to disk as a single  .zibravdb file.

classes.name: MDD Point Cache
classes.description: This output operator is used to write an MDD animation file.

classes.name: Mantra
classes.description: Renders the scene using Houdini’s standard mantra renderer and generates IFD files.

classes.name: Mantra Archive
classes.description: Generates disk-based archives which can be used by mantra.

classes.name: Merge
classes.description: Merges several render dependencies into one.

classes.name: Net Barrier
classes.description: Blocks the ROP network until synchronization occurs.

classes.name: Null
classes.description: Does nothing.

classes.name: OpenGL
classes.description: Render an image using the hardware-accelerated 3D viewport renderer.

classes.name: Pre Post
classes.description: Renders ROPs before and after a main job.

classes.name: Shell
classes.description: Runs an external command.

classes.name: Subnetwork
classes.description:
The SubNetwork output operator provides an easy way to manage large
number of output operators.

classes.name: Switch
classes.description: Renders one of several inputs.

classes.name: Tractor
classes.description: Tractor is a program shipped out with Pixar’s distribution of RenderMan.

classes.name: USD
classes.description: Renders a LOP network out to one or more USD files. This node is available as render node or as a LOP.

classes.name: USD Render
classes.description: Renders an output image from the stage generated by a LOP network.

classes.name: USD Stitch
classes.description: Merges USD files representing individual frames by composing them.

classes.name: USD Stitch Clips
classes.description: Merges multiple value clips representing individual frames.

classes.name: USD Zip
classes.description: Assembles USDZ archive files from existing USD files.

classes.name: Wedge
classes.description: Re-renders the same ROP multiple times with different settings

classes.name: Wren
classes.description: This output operator is used to drive the Wren rendering program.
